Package junitx.ant

Provides classes that integrate some of JUnit-addons functionalities for the Ant build tool.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
TestClassValidatorTask Validate a JUnit TestCase or TestSuite and outline potential errors in the definition of the classes.
 

Package junitx.ant Description

Provides classes that integrate some of JUnit-addons functionalities for the Ant build tool. More information about Ant can be found on the Ant website.
